pages.text: The $(item)Upgrade Matrix/$ can be used in place of $(item)Lapis Lazuli/$ for the crafting of any $(l:base_concepts/upgrades)upgrades/$. The advantage of using Upgrade Matrices is greatly decreased Lapis usage, which may be a boon if you have limited Lapis and many upgrades to craft.
One Lapis and one bucket of water will make four Upgrade Matrices in a $(item)Thermopneumatic Processing Plant/$ with 2 bar of pressure (assuming default recipes are in place).
